verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] paid emotional tribute to fallen law enforcement officers and the loved ones who carry on without them . He said Tuesday at an outdoor memorial near the Capitol that those who wore the uniform " were among the bravest Americans to ever live " and that they " made the ultimate sacrifice so that we could live in safety and in peace . " He also invited onstage the elderly mother and other loved ones of New York City officer Miosotis Familia , who was slain in July 2017 .
